Reviews.Title: Cute phone, but could be better
Reviews.Author: Patience Virtue
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine, cute phone (I get lots of compliments on my phone, actually). My only complaint is that it does not hold a charge for nearly as long as I would like it to. Other than that, perfectly functional basic phone that does its job.

Reviews.Title: Bought as gift
Reviews.Author: prissy "Xena  Fan"
Reviews.Content: My daughter love this device she won't put it down. Good beginner cell phone for young pre teens. No data package needed.
